name: @superexpert-ai/rag
description: Terminal tool to enable Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with Superexpert AI.
author: Stephen Walther

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "feat!: %s" && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "feat!: %s" && npm publish
scripts.bump:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha
